forecast.name: Today
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 62, with temperatures falling to around 58 in the afternoon. North wind around 20 mph, with gusts as high as 38 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Clear. Low around 47, with temperatures rising to around 49 overnight. North wind 12 to 20 mph, with gusts as high as 41 mph.

weather_report:
In Downtown San Francisco, the day unfolds under the embrace of bright sunlight, casting a warm glow over the city’s iconic landscape. The air is crisp, the visibility clear, offering breathtaking views of the Golden Gate Bridge and the hills that cradle the bay. With temperatures hovering around the low sixties, it's an inviting day to be outdoors, though you'll want to dress in layers; a light jacket will keep the afternoon chill at bay as the winds pick up from the north, reaching gusty heights that may surprise the unwary wanderer.

The absence of fog today enhances the city’s inherent beauty, allowing its vibrant hues to shine. As the sun slips into the later hours, the clear skies transition to a tranquil evening, perfect for a leisurely stroll along the waterfront or a contemplative visit to one of the city’s many parks. It’s an ideal time to indulge in the comforting pleasures of San Francisco, whether that means visiting a nearby café or exploring the storied streets that give the city its character. Today invites you to breathe in the crisp air and savor the simple joys of the urban landscape.
